desc: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit and deals damage.  Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities. The slowing effect lasts longer at night.

ATTACK SLOW: 50/50/50/50

8
lore: Balanar creates a vortex of infinite night, tearing opponents violently into the eternal darkness that once was.
name: night_stalker_void

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Night Stalker horrifies the target enemy Hero, causing it to miss attacks and become silenced.  The effect lasts longer at night.
attrib:
DAY DURATION: 3/3/3/3
NIGHT DURATION: 5/6/7/8

NIGHT CHANCE TO MISS: 50%

12
lore: A vision of the twisted maw of Balanar etches itself into the minds of the poor souls unlucky enough to cross his path.
name: night_stalker_crippling_fear

desc: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness.
lore: The hunting prowess of Balanar improves as the night beckons.
name: night_stalker_hunter_in_the_night

desc:
Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. While Darkness is in effect, enemy heroes, units, wards and buildings have their vision range reduced to 675.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
cmb:
0/0/0
160/120/80
lore: It is a humbling sight to see when the mightiest of warriors become afraid of the dark.
name: night_stalker_darkness
